metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36151 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect handling of input data in mysofa_resampler_reset_mem function in the libmysofa library 0.5 - 1.1 will lead to heap buffer overflow and overwriting large memory block.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36151` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 1.2~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 1.2~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~dfsg0-1').
